scripts.build: npx rescript build -with-deps && npx lessc style/style.less dist/style.css && webpack --mode development
scripts.dev: npx less-watch-compiler style/ dist/ && webpack --mode development --watch
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npx rescript && npx lessc style/style.less dist/style.css && webpack --mode production

agdaMode.connection.agdaVersion.description: Name of the executable of Agda. For searching the path. Overwrite to override.

agdaMode.connection.agdaPath.description: Path to the executable of Agda, automatically inferred when possible. Overwrite to override.

agdaMode.connection.commandLineOptions.description: Command-line options for Agda or Agda Language Server, delimited by space, like you would in terminal, e.g. "--without-K --safe"

agdaMode.connection.agdaLanguageServerPo.description: Port number for Agda Language Server (for the ease of development)

agdaMode.libraryPath.description: Paths to include (such as agda-stdlib), seperate with comma. Useless after Agda 2.5.0.

agdaMode.highlighting.IPC.description: How agda-mode receives highlighting information from Agda. Via either standard input/output or temporary files (which may require frequent disk access).

agdaMode.inputMethod.activationKey.description: Key for activating Unicode input method
